question: You are living in a University residence, and you have a problem with the high levels of noise froma new campus restaurant which is open late at night. Write a letter to the governor of theUniversity. In your letter,Complain about the situationSay why this is a problemAnd propose ways to reduce the noise
text: I am writing this letter to let you know about the inconvenience, I have been facing due to the disturbance caused by the newly opened canteen near my campus premises.

Let me explain my situation in detail. Due to the odd opening timings of this place which is up to 1:AM every night, an unbearable amount of noise caused by motorbikes, loud music and people talking keeps disturbing me.
As a result, I am unable to sleep properly and on time which is affecting my health and studies. Moreover, I am also a part-time worker , therefore lack of sleep causes me issues at work too.
I would like to suggest  if the canteen's opening timings can be restricted to 11:PM on weekdays and upto 12:PM on weekends, which I believe may be an effective solution to this issue.
I hope my request will be taken into consideration. Thankyou in advance.
